attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We as a country stand one of the smallest in the so called "developed World". We as a country stand as having one of the highest tax rates in the so called "developed world". 

So why in this country are we soo far behind in road maintenance?

We should be following America in there methods of road repairs. Cut the paper work and get it done.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
